name: SuperCTF
storyline: Middle school gym classes have united to create a professional capture the flag league, making it an official sport. Decades pass, popularity skyrockets, and the violent nature of human has made it a game of life or death with advanced weapons. The culture of society now revolves around Super Capture The Flag; mothers spank their children for coming home with poor gym class grades. The machine of life is now fueled by a single number that encompasses the value of self worth. It is both feared and sought after by every competitor. What once was wealth, is now.. the leaderboard.
summary: Team-based ranked multiplayer capture the flag with power-ups and weapons.
